about_the_game:
Get Those Bugs is a wave based tower defense with roguelite elements where you command a small party of magic soldiers to defeat hordes of attacking bugs. Upgrade and play cards on your units to strategically react to an ever evolving threat. Unlock additional power through meta progression to enable stronger builds to take on more difficult challenges.

The Artefacts

Send your units into battle across a variety of maps each with their own artefacts to defend. These mysterious artefacts may exhibit properties or abilities that change up the strategy needed to clear the stage.

The Bugs

These angry little guys absolutely despise the artefacts and will stop at nothing to take them down. Each different bug exhibits properties that require tactics and planning ahead to work around and their rapid evolution makes them even more dangerous. With hundreds of bugs descending on the artefacts at a time, your party of four has a lot to deal with. Get those bugs!

Unit Customization

Your soldiers are at the heart of your strategy and are exceptionally versatile. Choose their method of attack, the element they specialize in, and from a list of additional bonuses called Traits to further increase their capabilities. Unlock additional customization options through the rewards system.

Card Based Gameplay

Automatically receive cards from the deck during battle and choose how to best utilize them. Upgrade them, burn them for mana, or play them on units to increase their stats or activate additional powers.

Some cards may be tagged with special modifiers that change their effects. Take advantage of these rare cards!

Progression

Earn Tickets at the end of your runs based on your kills and accolades and spend those Tickets to unlock rewards. Unlock new cards, new mechanics, new traits, cosmetics and more!

A lot of unit power is locked behind the rewards system so make sure you spend your Tickets!

name: Get Those Bugs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Commander, hordes of angry bugs are on their way! Play your cards right to upgrade your units and overcome the constantly evolving bug threat before they take out the artefacts. Get Those Bugs!
